texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: AMENDMENT NO. 2
texts.text: AMENDMENT NO. 2

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Dated as of March 27, 2006
texts.text: Dated as of March 27, 2006

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Reference is hereby made to that certain fully executed Wireless Content License Agreement Number 12965 dated as of December 16, 2004, as amended November 11, 2005, ( "Agreement" ), between Fox Mobile Entertainment, Inc. ( "Fox" ), as Administrator for Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation ( "Trademark Licensor" ) and Glu Mobile, Inc. f/k/a Sorrent, Inc. ( "Licensee" ).
texts.text: Reference is hereby made to that certain fully executed Wireless Content License Agreement Number 12965 dated as of December 16, 2004, as amended November 11, 2005, ( "Agreement" ), between Fox Mobile Entertainment, Inc. ( "Fox" ), as Administrator for Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation ( "Trademark Licensor" ) and Glu Mobile, Inc. f/k/a Sorrent, Inc. ( "Licensee" ).

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The parties agree to modify the Agreement as follows:
texts.text: The parties agree to modify the Agreement as follows:

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A. "ICE AGE 2" a/k/a "ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN" AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS:
texts.text: A. "ICE AGE 2" a/k/a "ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN" AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Grant of Rights: Fox grants to Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property "ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN" in the United States: (A) 2 Scrat voicetones; (B) 2 John Leguizamo voicetones; and (C) 3 premium videos. Fox also grants Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property "ICE AGE 2" outside of the United States: (A) 4 Scrat voicetones; (B) 1 John Leguizamo voicetone; and (C) 3 premium videos. (collectively, "IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products")
texts.text: 1. Grant of Rights: Fox grants to Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property "ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN" in the United States: (A) 2 Scrat voicetones; (B) 2 John Leguizamo voicetones; and (C) 3 premium videos. Fox also grants Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property "ICE AGE 2" outside of the United States: (A) 4 Scrat voicetones; (B) 1 John Leguizamo voicetone; and (C) 3 premium videos. (collectively, "IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products")

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: B. IA 2 AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS ROYALTY:
texts.text: B. IA 2 AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS ROYALTY:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Royalty: In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Amendment 2, Licensee shall pay to Fox, or such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in the following amount:
texts.text: 1. Royalty: In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Amendment 2, Licensee shall pay to Fox, or such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in the following amount:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (a) From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee's Gross Receipts (as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee's sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products. ("IA2 Audio and Video Royalty"). For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee may not recoup any portion of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1) through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
texts.text: (a) From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee's Gross Receipts (as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee's sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products. ("IA2 Audio and Video Royalty"). For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee may not recoup any portion of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1) through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. VGSL and other CSP Accounting: All VGSL and other CSP payments remitted directly to Fox pursuant to the VGSL Agreement and other CSP agreements with respect to the IA Audio and Video Wireless Products shall be treated in the same manner as set forth in Paragraphs 7(b)(ii) and 7(b)(iii) of the Agreement.
texts.text: 2. VGSL and other CSP Accounting: All VGSL and other CSP payments remitted directly to Fox pursuant to the VGSL Agreement and other CSP agreements with respect to the IA Audio and Video Wireless Products shall be treated in the same manner as set forth in Paragraphs 7(b)(ii) and 7(b)(iii) of the Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: ***** The omitted portions of this exhibit have been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to a request for confidential treatment under Rule 406 promulgated under the Securities Act of 1933.
texts.text: ***** The omitted portions of this exhibit have been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to a request for confidential treatment under Rule 406 promulgated under the Securities Act of 1933.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: GLU MOBILE INC, S-1/A, 3/19/2007
texts.text: Source: GLU MOBILE INC, S-1/A, 3/19/2007

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. No Direct-to-Consumer Distribution Royalty: Licensee shall not be entitled to receive a share of any revenues and shall have no claim to any revenues earned and collected by Fox, or a third-party Fox designates, for the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products which Fox distributes through its and its assigns' direct-to-consumer distribution channels.
texts.text: 3. No Direct-to-Consumer Distribution Royalty: Licensee shall not be entitled to receive a share of any revenues and shall have no claim to any revenues earned and collected by Fox, or a third-party Fox designates, for the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products which Fox distributes through its and its assigns' direct-to-consumer distribution channels.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect.
texts.text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: By signing in the places indicated below, the parties hereto accept and agree to all of the terms and conditions hereof.
texts.text: By signing in the places indicated below, the parties hereto accept and agree to all of the terms and conditions hereof.
